gloss: a formal statement of a command or injunction to do something / a remark that calls attention to something or someone / an authoritative direction or instruction to do something / change orientation or direction, also in the abstract sense / give instructions to or direct somebody to do something with authority / lying between two extremes in time or space or state / make reference to / move ahead (of others) in time or space / passing reference or indirect mention
give an exhibition of to an interested audience
give an exhibition of to an interested audience / to show, make visible or apparent
